遭.definition: to meet by chance (usually with misfortune); classifier for events: time, turn, incident

遭到.definition: to suffer; to meet with (sth unfortunate)

遭拒.definition: to meet with a refusal (e.g. visa); to have an application rejected

遭瘟.definition: to suffer from a plague; to endure a misfortune; a plague on him!

遭遇.definition: to meet with; to encounter; (bitter) experience

遭重.definition: (slang) to suffer serious consequences or harm
